This blog is dedicated to
taking handwritten notes,
or any element and aspect
related to it.

It is a love letter, maybe even
a memoir, about the art, science,
practice, and joy of taking notes.

The blog's title is inspired
by Stephen King's On Writing
and Willian Zinsser's On
Writing Well.

Written and rendered with
[Supernote](https://supernote.com/)
Built and published with
[Quarto](https://quarto.org/)
Writing emoticon copied from
[looks.wtf](https://looks.wtf/).
